CreateMonitor.summary: NOTE Experimental The CreateMonitor interface provides information on the progress of an AI model download or some fine-tuning data for the model.

remarks.para:
-Using the Summarizer API
-Web AI demos on chrome.dev.

CreateMonitorDownloadprogress.summary: NOTE Experimental The downloadprogress event of the interface is fired when progress is made on the AI model download.

remarks.para:
-Using the Summarizer API
-Web AI demos on chrome.dev.
